commands.name: az image builder optimizer add
commands.summary: Add optimizer to an existing image builder template.
commands.syntax:
az image builder optimizer add [--defer]
                               [--enable-vm-boot {false, true}]
                               [--ids]
                               [--name]
                               [--resource-group]
                               [--subscription]
examples: az image builder optimizer add -n myTemplate -g myGroup --enable-vm-boot true --defer

commands.name: az image builder optimizer remove
commands.summary: Remove optimizer from an existing image builder template.
examples: az image builder optimizer remove -n myTemplate -g myGroup --defer

commands.name: az image builder optimizer show
commands.summary: Show optimizer of an existing image builder template.
examples: az image builder optimizer show -n myTemplate -g myGroup --defer

commands.name: az image builder optimizer update
commands.summary: Update an optimizer from an existing image builder template.
commands.syntax:
az image builder optimizer update [--defer]
                                  [--enable-vm-boot {false, true}]
                                  [--ids]
                                  [--name]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--subscription]
examples: az image builder optimizer update -n myTemplate -g myGroup --enable-vm-boot true --defer
